text:
e="preserve">Arthur Edward Imperatore Sr. (July 8, 1925 – November 18, 2020) was an American businessman. He was best known as being the founder and president of the NY Waterway, a ferry service. He was born in West New York, New Jersey. He was the owner of the Colorado Rockies.
Imperatore Sr. died on November 18, 2020 in New York City at the age of 95.
